articles.title: Harvey Norman posts bumper profit, repays more than $6m in JobKeeper payments - 9News
articles.description: Retail giant Harvey Norman has repaid the Australian Government more than $6 million in JobKeeper payments following months of social commentary around the ethics of accepting business supports while profitable.
